formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: A unique name for this configuration. (Required)

formElement.label: Login As:
formElement.documentation: The user name and password to use to connect to the specified TestTrack URL. (Required)

formElement.label: URL:
formElement.documentation: The URL to use to connect to a TestTrack server. For example: 'http://10.10.10.10:8080' or 'http://yourTestTrackserver'. (Required)

formElement.label: Project:
formElement.documentation: A unique project for this configuration. (Required)

formElement.label: Defect Type:
formElement.documentation: A type for the commited defects in this configuration. (Required)

formElement.label: Commit User:
formElement.documentation: A unique user commiting defects in this configuration. (Required)
